mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC (ExecYear, GroupId, RegisterCode, RegisteDate) (SELECT to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'), b.groupid, #{USERID}, sysdate FROM sys_object_user_basegroup a JOIN sys_object_group b ON a.DeptCode = b.GroupCode and b.GroupType='Dept' LEFT JOIN COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE UserCode = #{USERID} AND c.GROUPID IS NULL AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y')
mapper.select:
/* collab.common.getUserTeam */
SELECT SEQ AS "Seq" ,USERCODE AS "UserCode" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MULTICOMPANYNAME) AS "CompanyName" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MULTIDEPTNAME) AS "DeptName" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MULTIJOBLEVELNAME) AS "JobLevelName" ,a.COMPANYCODE AS "CompanyCode" ,DEPTCODE AS "DeptCode" ,JOBLEVELCODE AS "JobLevelCode" ,b.GROUPID AS "GroupID" ,(SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang},sou.MULTIDISPLAYNAME) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP ctm JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER sou on ctm.USERCODE = sou.USERCODE WHERE ctm.DEPTCODE = a.DEPTCODE AND ROWNUM =1) as "TmUser" ,(SELECT count(sou.usercode) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP ctm JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER sou on ctm.USERCODE = sou.USERCODE WHERE ctm.DEPTCODE = a.DEPTCODE) as "TmUserCnt" ,c.ExecYear "ExecYear" FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP a JOIN SYS_OBJECT_GROUP b ON a.DEPTCODE = b.GROUPCODE and b.GroupType='Dept' JOIN COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE USERCODE = #{USERID} AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y' ORDER BY DECODE(JOBTYPE, 'Origin' ,1,2)

SELECT GroupID "GroupID" ,GroupCode "GroupCode" ,CompanyCode "CompanyCode" ,GroupType "GroupType" ,MemberOf "MemberOf" ,DisplayName "DisplayName" ,MultiDisPlayName "MultiDisPlayName" ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},MultiDisPlayName) AS "TransMultiDisplayName" ,LENGTH(SORTPATH) - LENGTH(REPLACE(SORTPATH,';','')) AS "SortDepth" ,GroupPath "GroupPath" FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupType IN ('Dept','Company')
AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT(#{GR_GroupPath},'%')
AND GroupPath LIKE 'ORGROOT;'||#{CompanyCode}||';%'
AND IsUse = 'Y' AND IsDisplay = 'Y' AND MemberOf != 'NOUSE' ORDER BY SortPath asc
